modules.description: Handles maildir file operations including message parsing, directory traversal, and flag manipulation. Works with maildir directories, message files, and flag metadata. Used to process incoming email deliveries and manage message states in a mail server context.

Creates and manages Maildir directories, handling message storage and retrieval. Operates on message data, unique identifiers, and flags, allowing addition, access, modification, and iteration over messages. Enables efficient message management in email systems by maintaining structured access to mail folders.
